name: Scythe Nun
description:
his was the first game that develops, so I hope you can understand, if there are many bugs or design problems, I apologize, the next games will improve.

I accept any tips or complaints that are constructive. ;)

------------------------------/ /------------------------------/

Story: In a fantasy world, the threat of one of the bishops of the chaos is imminent, so they summon a Nun who is preparing to become a Priestess, to end this bishop, but on the way she ends up having difficulty, having to go to one parallel dimension called Moonlight to end him, now you will have to guide Celeste (Name of the nun) to the bishop, to end his follies.
